MEET Award Winning Journalists Amy and David Goodman

THURSDAY, April 2, CAMBRIDGE FORUM BENEFIT

6:30 pm Reception with Amy and David Goodman precedes the program.

Advance tickets: $10 for students and Cambridge Forum members; $15 general admission. At the door: $15. All proceeds benefit Cambridge Forum. Purchase tickets by calling 617-495-2727.

Award-winning journalist Amy Goodman of Democracy Now! and her brother investigative reporter David Goodman, discuss their latest book Standing Up to the Madness: Ordinary Heroes in Extraordinary Times, in a special program to benefit Cambridge Forum. The Goodmans share their experiences in the trenches as they travel the nation and find a healthy grassroots base for participatory democracy. Join us for a memorable evening. Book signing, courtesy of Harvard Book Store, follows the program.

Book: Standing Up to the Madness: Ordinary Heroes in Extraordinary Times

Cambridge Forum is taped and edited for public radio broadcast. Edited CDs are available to the public by contacting 617-495-2727. Select forums can be viewed in their entirety on demand by visiting our website at www.cambridgeforum.org and clicking on the WGBH Forum Network.
